description: The HEMORRHAGE_SRC table contains the source of the hemorrhage.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HEMORRHAGE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item displays the source of the hemorrhage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

Subcutaneous


Renal artery


Renal vein


Kidney cortex


Bladder


Arterial


Venous
